testsuite.name: MealPlannerTests

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
Your output should contain "The meal has been added!"
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
What would you like to do (add, show, exit)? > show No meals saved. Add a meal first. What would you like to do (add, show, exit)? > new meal What would you like to do (add, show, exit)? > meal What would you like to do (add, show, exit)? > What would you like to do (add, show, exit)? > What would you like to do (add, show, exit)? > add Which meal do you want to add (breakfast, lunch, dinner)? > dessert Wrong meal category! Choose from: breakfast, lunch, dinner. > nothing Wrong meal category! Choose from: breakfast, lunch, dinner. > meal1 Wrong meal category! Choose from: breakfast, lunch, dinner. > meal@ Wrong meal category! Choose from: breakfast, lunch, dinner. > Wrong meal category! Choose from: breakfast, lunch, dinner. > Wrong meal category! Choose from: breakfast, lunch, dinner. > lunch Input the meal's name: > burger1 Wrong format. Use letters only! > sushi@ Wrong format. Use letters only! > Wrong format. Use letters only! > Wrong format. Use letters only! > sushi Input the ingredients: > salmon, rice1, avocado Wrong format. Use letters only! > salmon, , avocado Wrong format. Use letters only! > salmon,, avocado Wrong format. Use letters only! > salmon, rice, Wrong format. Use letters only! > salmon, rice, avocado@ Wrong format. Use letters only! > salmon, rice, avocado Wrong format. Use letters only!
